name: Oukyuu No Hihou Tension
overview: The player control a curious creature that travels from his village in search of the stolen rainbow diamonds. The gameplay changed everytime that the game is player since each dungeon changed his design. The gameplay is about an action rpg style since tyou can smash the enemies fighting againts them. To advance in the game the player will have to speak with different kind of characters and advance through 7 different big dungeons, each of them with different levels to pass through.
